"Well Fireblade. I am Ultra Megatron, the true leader of the Decepticons. 
And if you want a battle then you'll get one," UM tells him and pulls out 
his "Microman" sword from his subspace compartment.


>From: gunthers8@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Where is he??
>Date: Sun, 29 Apr 2001 23:42:58 -0000
>
>::FireBlade::
>FireBlade arrived to the position of the Stunticons and Megatron and
>so on.  He transformed to bot mode and looked to Megatron.
>"Where is he...Where is SwitchBlade..I know he is near."
>Then he noticed the other Megatron.
>"What is this deception, who is he?"
>FireBlade stepped in front of this bot and pulled out his giant sword.
>Blue flame began to flow around the blade.
>FireBlade stood ready to protect his fellow Decepticons should they
>need it.
>
